actions.description: The behir makes two attacks: one with its bite and one to constrict.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Large or smaller creature. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 17 (2d10 + 6) slashing damage. The target is grappled (escape DC 16) if the behir isn't already constricting a creature, and the target is restrained until this grapple ends.
actions.name: Constrict

actions.description: The behir exhales a line of lightning that is 20 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 66 (12d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Lightning Breath (Recharge 5-6)

actions.description:
The behir makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the behir, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the behir's turns. A behir can have only one creature swallowed at a time.
If the behir takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the behir must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls prone in a space within 10 feet of the behir. If the behir dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 ft. of movement, exiting prone.
actions.name: Swallow

special_abilities.name: Divine Eminence
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, Dagdra can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 (3d6) radiant damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If Dagdra expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by 1d6 for each level above 1st.

spellcasting.desc: Dagdra is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). Dagdra has the following cleric spells prepared:

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Mace

actions.description: As an action, Dagdra draws a spell scroll from her documancy satchel. The scroll contains a spell of up to 3rd level of Dagdra's choice. Only Dagdra can use the scroll, which vanishes after 1 minute.
actions.name: Scroll Service (1/Day)

spellcasting.desc: Devil Dog is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). Devil Dog has following cleric spells prepared:

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Club

special_abilities.name: Reach
special_abilities.desc: The tentacle can reach anywhere in the room.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 35 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the creature is restrained, and the tentacle can't constrict another target.
actions.name: Constrict

spellcasting.desc: Gildha is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). Gildha has following cleric spells prepared:

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Club

special_abilities.name: Martial Advantage
special_abilities.desc: Once per turn, Grunka can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of Grunka that isn't incapacitated.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage if used with two hands.
actions.name: Longsword

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.
actions.name: Longbow

actions.description:
Grunka sprays acid in a 10-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
The spray gun has a tank that can be filled with ten standard vials of acid mixed with water, allowing it to be used five times.
actions.name: Acid Spray Gun (Recharge 5-6)

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Shortsword

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Shortbow

actions.description: The chimera makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its horns, and one with its claws. When its fire breath is available, it can use the breath in place of its bite or horns.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Horns

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claws

actions.description: The dragon head exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 (7d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The cat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Relative Size
special_abilities.desc: Any damage Onyx would take is reduced to 0. She has advantage on ability checks and saving throws.

special_abilities.name: Dealing with Onyx
special_abilities.desc: Onyx cannot be overcome or killed by combat. Any weapon attack against her that hits AC 12 makes contact but deals no lasting damage. However, if the attack would deal 10 or more damage, Onyx has disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of her next turn. If Onyx would take 10 or more damage from spells or other effects, it yields the same result. Spells that impose conditions function normally against Onyx, but those conditions end automatically at the end of the cat's next turn.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d10) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claws

name: Replica Duodrone
subtitle: Medium construct, lawful neutral
languages: Modron, can understand Common but speaks only preprogrammed responses

special_abilities.name: Axiomatic Mind
special_abilities.desc: The duodrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

special_abilities.name: Dismantlable
special_abilities.desc: If the replica duodrone dies, its body falls into a pile of parts (gears, plates, screws, and wires), leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

actions.description: The duodrone makes two fist attacks or two javelin attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Fist

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.
actions.name: Javelin

subtitle: Medium construct, lawful neutral
languages: Modron, can understand Common but speaks only preprogrammed responses

special_abilities.name: Axiomatic Mind
special_abilities.desc: The monodrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

special_abilities.name: Dismantlable
special_abilities.desc: If the replica monodrone dies, its body falls into a pile of parts (gears, plates, screws, and wires), leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dagger

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage.
actions.name: Javelin

name: Replica Pentadrone
subtitle: Large construct, lawful neutral
languages: Modron, can understand Common but speaks only preprogrammed responses

special_abilities.name: Axiomatic Mind
special_abilities.desc: The pentadrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

special_abilities.name: Dismantlable
special_abilities.desc: If the replica pentadrone dies, its body falls into a pile of parts (gears, plates, screws, and wires), leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

actions.description: The pentadrone makes five arm attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Arm

actions.description: The pentadrone exhales a 30-foot cone of gas. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
actions.name: Paralysis Gas (Recharge 5-6)

name: Replica Quadrone
subtitle: Medium construct, lawful neutral
languages: Modron, can understand Common but speaks only preprogrammed responses

special_abilities.name: Axiomatic Mind
special_abilities.desc: The quadrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

special_abilities.name: Dismantlable
special_abilities.desc: If the replica quadrone dies, its body falls into a pile of parts (gears, plates, screws, and wires), leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

actions.description: The quadrone makes two fist attacks or four shortbow attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Fist

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Shortbow

special_abilities.name: Turn Immunity
special_abilities.desc: The foot is immune to effects that turn undead.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Stomp

special_abilities.name: Cunning Action
special_abilities.desc: On each of its turns, Two Dry Cloaks can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

special_abilities.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
special_abilities.desc: Two Dry Cloaks deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Two Dry Cloaks that isn't incapacitated and Two Dry Cloaks doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.description: Two Dry Cloaks makes two melee attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Shortsword

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Hand Crossbow

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw against being magically petrified. On a failed save, the creature begins to turn to stone and is restrained. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is petrified for 24 hours.
actions.name: Bite
